        public static void hasText(Assert<? extends java.io.File> $receiver,
                           java.lang.String expected,
                           java.nio.charset.Charset charset)

        Asserts the file contains exactly the expected text (and nothing else).

        Parameters:
        charset - The character set of the file, default is Charsets.UTF_8
        See Also:
        hasBytes

      • containsText

        public static void containsText(Assert<? extends java.io.File> $receiver,
                                java.lang.String expected,
                                java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Deprecated. 

        Asserts the file contains the expected text, it may contain other things.

        Parameters:
        charset - The character set of the file, default is Charsets.UTF_8
        See Also:
        FileKt.hasText, FileKt.matchesText

      • matchesText

        public static void matchesText(Assert<? extends java.io.File> $receiver,
                               kotlin.text.Regex expected,
                               java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Deprecated. 

        Asserts the file's text matches the expected regular expression.

        Parameters:
        charset - The character set of the file, default is Charsets.UTF_8
        See Also:
